modName: Witcher3 based Toussaint Knight armor collection - DELETED
summary: Four heavy plates based on various W3 Toussaint Knight armors for your modding pleasure.
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=3]I made those armors originally for Enderal.As I do not have the drive to add them to Skyrim,I am giving them to the community[u] under the condition that they are used as i[/u]s (no mesh modifications unless fixing any possible errors and most certainly not using them to make  skimpy versions!).So you can add them to Skyrim but you can not alter the mesh unless you are fixing something (I took great care to make these armors so there is litle left to improve but if you are up to the task go ahead).


[i][color=#ffff00][u]Credits:[/u][/color][/i]

[/size][/b][b][size=3][b][size=3]CD PROJECTRED (Witcher series) for allowing the use of their assets.[/size][/b][b][size=3] [/size][size=3]


ToastyFresh-Gothic Plate armor[/size][/b][b][size=3] [/size][size=3]


[/size][/b][/size][/b][b][size=3][b][size=3][b][size=3][b][size=3]Hovihar:Knight armor and sword.[/size][/b][/size][/b]

[color=#ffff00][i]
Tools used[/i] :[/color]
